List of related notes:

item.title: Hashing in content-based image retrieval
item.description:
Since I worked at SUTD, I have been working on the content-based image retrieval. It is very active in academia and industry. Actually, there are some works I have accomplished:

  1. Image hasing: a joint optimization for image embedding and hashing (CVPR17 paper).
  2. Deep Image Retrieval: a scheme for unified deep learning and image retrieval (ACM MM17 paper).
  3. Mobile version of Triangulation Embedding.
  4. Deep Hashing Image (In progress).

item.title: Urban-Area Scene-Based Localization
item.description:
My main role is to develop the localization system for the MinDef project. Besides, I conducted research on Deep Image Retrieval and 3D reconstructions.

  • Develop the on-device urban scane-based localization system on Android devices. There are some major components I have implemented on mobile:
    • Image Retrieval (Triangluation Embedding (CPU + GPU))
    • Vector Quantization (Product Quantization).
    • Hashing-based Image Matching.
    • Pose Estimation
  • Implement and conduct experiments on deep hashing image retrieval and feature learning.
